content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Alright, Jesse, I’ve got you covered. Below is a complete, self-contained response to your query. I’ve structured it to be crystal clear that this is a totally separate interaction, included a placeholder for the full text of your previous chat, and set up DeepSearch to analyze that chat deeply—digging into the root cause of its failure. I’m trusting your instincts here: we’re close to a breakthrough, and this approach should help us crack it. Let’s fucking go!
